entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adding an .svg to the Resources/Images folder in a Maui project issue #10082
  • MAUI 17.4pr1, Markup extension cause debugger fail to attach #10081
  • ScrollView doesn't have any deceleration for iOS in .NET MAUI #10080
  • .NET MAUI App Icon and Splash screen cannot be customized #10079
  • Grouped CollectionView lazy loading does not trigger [RemainingItemsThresholdReached] on iOS and Windows #10078
  • .NET MAUI App Icon and Splash screen cannot be customized #10072
  • MAUI Blazor app with long reference paths fails to Deploy on Windows #10068
    .NET 8 Planning
  • HotReload doesn't work for DataTemplate property changes in custom controls #10066
    Backlog
  • SwipeItemView does not work #10065
    Backlog
  • Multiple ViewCell in a single TableView causes them to collapse on Android #10064
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Cannot hide caption buttons from title bar #10057
  • CarouselView not displaying EmptyView when Loop is disabled #10056
    Backlog
  • Application.Current.RequestedThemeChanged has not be triggered on Mac #10055
    Backlog
  • MAUI Blazor app published as "a single (.exe) file app" cannot start #10054
    Backlog
  • Permission Denied returned when approximate location is selected #10053
    Backlog
  • Load an SVG from web URL #10050
    Backlog

Closed

  • Android WebView with empty Source breaks rendering #9392
    Backlog
  • Why Error compiling Android/Windows (Release) Debug Model Compiling NoError #8815
  • CheckBox's VisualState is not work #8596
    Backlog
  • Canvas background on iOS isn't transparent #9740
    Backlog
  • ImageButton IsLoading Property Is Not Set #9073
    Backlog
  • Infinite ScrollView with BlazorWebView #10043
  • .appinstaller file not generated when publishing .Net Maui App #9985

PullRequests

Created

  • Compress Grid measurements for star rows/columns #10073
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Windows] Fix Essentials Email #10063
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Windows] Fix COMException using Connectivity class #10062
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Windows] Fix Border clipping issue #10061
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Bump Selenium.Support from 4.1.1 to 4.4.0 #10060
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Selenium.WebDriver from 4.1.1 to 4.4.0 #10059
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [Build] Small fixes to pipelines #10067
  • Fix CheckBox's VisualStates #8605
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox, .NET 7 Planning
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.6.1.7 to 1.7.0 #9845
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Align GraphicsView Background behavior between platforms #9944
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [Android] Fix rendering using WebView without Source #9916
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Core] Fix ImageButton IsLoading property #9917
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10030
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Support Window.Frame on all platforms #10028
    7.0-rc2
  • Build the net6 templates in net7 #9758
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update Font inline docs #10014
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Allow custom layout managers for existing layout types in Controls #9470
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Essentials] Fixes IPreferences DateTime handling #9974
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Housekeeping] Complete pending TODOs in Core #10015
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump xunit from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 #9214
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix shapes sizing and alignment #9607
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Update docs animations #9746
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22451.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22452.2 #9922
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
